question: Match the following:
column_II: Fusion of one male gamete with egg cell
Triploid structure formed after triple fusion

matches.right: Fusion of one male gamete with egg cell
Triploid structure formed after triple fusion

answer: Syngamy → Fusion of one male gamete with egg cell, Triple fusion → Fusion of three haploid nuclei, Double fertilisation → Unique to flowering plants, Primary endosperm nucleus (PEN) → Triploid structure formed after triple fusion, Primary endosperm cell (PEC) → Develops into the endosperm

question: Match the following:
column_II: Includes maturation of ovule into seed

matches.right: Includes maturation of ovule into seed

answer: Zygote → Develops into embryo, Primary endosperm cell → Formed after triple fusion, Post-fertilisation events → Includes maturation of ovule into seed, Endosperm development → Precedes embryo development, Embryo development → Follows endosperm development
